scripts.diff: yarn build && cd $npm_package_cdk_dir && yarn cdk diff -a 'cdk.out/' $npm_package_env_stage-*
scripts.diff-site: yarn build && cd $npm_package_cdk_dir && yarn cdk diff -a 'site.cdk.out/' $npm_package_env_stage-*
scripts.bootstrap: cd $npm_package_cdk_dir && yarn build && yarn cdk bootstrap --trust 320946421302 --cloudformation-execution-policies arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/AdministratorAccess aws://$npm_package_env_account/$npm_package_env_region
